chapter.title: Function Table Control
chapter.para: Refer to the f score statement, ftgen, ftgentmp, ftgenonce and the GEN Routines section for information on creating tables.
Tables can be removed from memory using the ftfree opcode.
Tables by default, require a size which is a power of two. However tables with any size can be generated by specifying the size as a negative number (see f score statement).

note.para: Not all opcodes accept tables whose size is not a power of two, as this may be a requirement for internal processing.

chapter.para: For information on table access, consult the section Table Access.
Tables for use with the loscilx opcode can be loaded using sndload.
